original_text: He has brought you, Korah, and all the other descendants of Levi near to himself. But it seems that you want to be priests as well.
korean_text: 하나님이 너와 네 모든 형제 레위 자손으로 너와 함께 가까이 오게 하셨거늘 너희가 오히려 제사장의 직분을 구하느냐

sentences.original_text: Korah, and all the other descendants of Levi
you want to be priests as well
sentences.korean_translation: 당신도 제사장이 되고 싶은 것 같습니다
